doc.field: The Poly Frame Rack contains material from 1848 to 2011. This material includes photographs, portraits, plaques, proclamations, drawings, and diplomas. Shelf 1 and 5 include materials that are accessioned into the Herman Mark Papers, Shelf 2 includes materials that are accessioned into the Ernst Weber Papers, Shelf 6 includes materials that are accessioned into the Administrative Papers of the President and Chancellor George Bugliariello, and Shelf 5 and 8 include materials that are accessioned into the Jerry Hutlin Papers. The Poly Archives Frame Rack is located in the Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology.
Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries
